text: Can you help me check if I have an appointment on April 12th, 2023 with Dr. Smith?
Sure. Please tell me your patient name.
Alright. Let me check for you.
According to our records, you have an appointment with Dr. Smith on April 12th, 2023 at 2pm. Would you like me to reschedule that appointment?
Yes, please. Can you help me schedule it for April 15th, 2023 at 10am?
Certainly. Let me schedule that appointment for you.
Your appointment has been successfully rescheduled on April 15th, 2023 at 10am. Anything else I can help you with?
